page.title: 10Family life-the Ogden family
page.content: My name is{John Barry Ogden,}I live in Cadishead with my wife{Linda}and daughters{Elizabeth (12)}and{Hazel {(8).}I have lived in Cadishead all my life, as have my parents, but my wife moved here in her teens from Urmston. I work for the Properties Department of{Greater Manchester Transport}and {Linda was an industrial chemist}at {Shell U.K.}in Carrington until Elizabeth was born. Then we decided to change her role to that of{housewife until our children reach their teens. Both children attend local schools with Elizabeth at Irlam High and Hazel at Cadishead Junior. We enjoy the{countryside}and involve ourselves in local affairs eg. a {Natural History Club, Police Community {Liaison Pannel and school life.}The children also like{swimming and sport.
